com.wikiraceassistant.crawler

Class Leg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wikiraceassistant.crawler.Leg

  • public class Leg
extends java.lang.Object
    One leg of the crawling journey. Scapes all the data from a webpage and looks for the given word, plus links to visit next
